doc: The pathname to the file containing the geometries of the chemical system/s given as input.
Defines how to interprete an input file containing multiple geometries. Possible values are SingleGeom, ReactProd, ReactTSProd, and Path.
The pathname to a file defining the details of the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
The definition of the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
The path+rootname of any input file for the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
Defines the charge of the chemical system/s given as input.
Defines the spin multiplicity of the chemical system/s given as input.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
